mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uu_member WHERE memId = #{memId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uu_member(memId, passwd, name, jumin1, jumin2, age, gender, address, phone, email, reg_date, grade) VALUES(#{memId}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{jumin1}, #{jumin2}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{reg_date}, '일반회원')
